name: Finding Ice
description:
A percentage of all profits made on this game go to WWF to help combat climate change in the world's most vulnerable ecosystems.

Embark upon a unique and tear-jerking journey about an Arctic Wolf and his mission to discover his past in the face of climate change. Explore the vast wilderness that surrounds the East Falls, uncovering clues as to what happened in his past life.

Set in the imaginary East Falls Mountains, Finding Ice takes the player on a one-of-a-kind experience to discover how manmade climate change has devastated the once sprawling and stunning landscape.

The player must re-connect with nature in order to progress to the next phase of this story game, they must collect items in order to progress to the next phase of this beautiful story.

• Explore many stylized maps as a third-person Arctic Wolf.
• Uncover an emotional story with an outstanding soundtrack.
• Discover the East Falls alongside a variety of 'pets', each with unique characteristics.


Uncover a seemingly untouched world through a third-person Arctic Wolf and discover the truth about the catastrophe unfolding before your very eyes:




Discover clues of a past long-forgotten:



Will you reconnect with nature and help heal the natural world? Or will you be a bystander to one of the greatest catastrophes ever?
